content:
Sounds like you've got a fun shopping trip planned! World Market is a great place to find unique gifts, and their handmade jewelry and artisanal home decor are definitely worth checking out. And, of course, their international food section is a treasure trove for foodies! You'll likely find a great selection of authentic Indian spices and other global ingredients to satisfy your cravings.

As for Target, it's always a good idea to check their website or mobile app before heading out to see what's new and on sale. Cat & Jack is a popular brand, and they often release new designs and collections seasonally. You might be able to find some fresh summer dresses or other cute items at a discounted price. Keep an eye out for their weekly ads, Cartwheel offers, and online promo codes to maximize your savings.

If you're planning to visit Target, I recommend checking out their website or app to:

1. Browse their online catalog and create a shopping list of the items you want to grab.
2. Check for sales, discounts, and Cartwheel offers on the items you want.
3. Look for digital coupons and promo codes that you can apply at checkout.
4. Consider using their Order Pickup or Drive Up services to save time and avoid lines.

By doing your research beforehand, you'll be able to make the most of your shopping trip and snag some great deals on the items you want.

Have a fantastic time shopping, and I hope you find some amazing gifts, decor, and dresses!
